name: Julie Litz
text: Love this consignment shop! Great deals and sales!

name: Chris Browning
text: Excellent prices and wonderfully kind staff!

name: Alexandria Hatfield
text:
Both summer AND winter clothing. I dropped off 5-6 bins full of men’s khaki shorts, khaki pants, jeans, dress shirts, & athletic gear. ***ALL are brand names such as POLO Ralph Lauren, J.Crew, Patagonia, Vineyard Vines, Coastal Cotton, Southern Marsh, Nike/Adidas, & much more!

***Most items are NEW w/ TAGS or barely worn clothes! All items are in GREAT CONDITION.*** (size 29-32 in mens/boys pants. Men’s size Small & Medium in shirts. Some “boys XL 18-20” in dress shirts as well.)

This is my brother’s first year at West Point (go Army!). He isn’t allowed to come home very much these next 4 years, so we have cleaned out his entire closet & have taken ALL of his clothes to Fashion Exchange in Athens, AL!

These clothes will only be allowed to stay on the floor for just 3 months. Go check them out soon!

name: Joel Bittner
text: If I knew they were tossing out more stuff then they put up I would just go to the dumpster to shop. If people only knew where there stuff goes it would be a lot less stuff in the store. Although they have good prices I will still shop there I really thank they should not do what they do to surplus stuff but don’t toss it in the dumpster put it in a bin for sale  a dime a bag sounds good!!!

resp.text: We only throw away stuff that is btoken or stained  and we appreciate  your concern ty

name: Julie Bartlett
text: Make sure you know all the POLICIES before you shop. Having to use an in store credit within 2 weeks is ridiculous. 1. they all ready have the money , 2. the type of shop it is they may not have anything you want in that time span, 3. yes they have expenses, but all the merchandise is pure profit so........, 4. if you don't find anything you want in 2 weeks they get paid for selling nothing. They have lost a customer

resp.text: Sorry you feel that way most thrift stores dont even do credit  but now we dont do returns

name: Jessica Thornton
text: Went to check out some baby items they had outside and it was filthy and was not clean at all. Your charging 80.00 for a stroller and carseat make sure you clean it it up a little. Was very disappointed on the items. Yeah I could of went home and clean it but if I'm paying that price (cheaper than Walmart) I would think they would of clean it.

resp.text: Sorry i will mention it to my staff sorry for any inconvenience

text: First time to visit this little shop and I was very pleased. The owners were super friendly and offered assistance without being pushy. I loved the way each item of clothing was marked with the size and a bit of a description, so it was easy to find an appropriate item quickly.

name: Bettie Cheek
text: This is a Prattville must on your favorites. Great clothes at great prices. They also have special events that they put together so people of all ages in Prattville and surrounding areas can get together and meet other people. At this wonderful place you can buy clothes, shoes and accessories. You can learn how to live a healthier life, get your hair done by the most amazing hair stylist and much more. Check them out on FB or stop in asap.

text: The Junque Market is a great shop with a little something for everyone. You can find everything there from gifts, man cave items, furniture, vintage items, antiques, and records just to name a few. The atmosphere is awesome and very welcoming. I would highly recommend a visit to The Junque Market.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of The Junque Market.

text: Great store!  Antiques & farmhouse signs furniture jewelry and Dixie Belle paints.  I was so excited about the paints!

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful review, Sherry! We appreciate you taking the time out of your day to praise our shop. As a token of gratitude, mention this review the next time you come in, and we will give you a 10% discount on your purchase. Thanks again! 😁

name: Jennie Ward
text: Awesome :)

name: Gemma Fowler
text: My sister-in-law needed a dress for her daughter's upcoming July wedding.  She had shopped everywhere and had come up short and was discouraged. I met her at The Clothes Tree and what a fantastic experience it was! Mandy was so helpful and encouraging. She alone is reason to shop here! She could not have been more patient or helpful and gave us her undivided attention. My sister-in-law tried on about 40 dresses. The selection at this store is amazing and vast. A couple of the dresses she tried on were from the clearance rack that were marked down 80%. She tried on dresses up to almost $1000. Mandy and the other girl who was helping other customers both agreed that one of the dresses from the clearance rack was best suited for her. It was true and we were both so impressed that they weren't just interested in making the most money they could but were honest about which dress looked the best on her. It was the best dress shopping experience either of us had ever experienced. I highly recommend this shop to anyone in need of a formal dress and I plan to go there when my daughter gets engaged to find my own MOB dress. How have I missed this treasure all these years?!

name: Ron Boisclair
text: Outstanding selection of women's formal wear, exceptional service from Mandy. A 5-star experience from the time we entered. We bought a beautiful formal dress for attending an August wedding.  Forget Saks, Macy's, Belks, etc.  Make Clothes Tree your first stop.

name: Tracy Craven
text: My wife and daughter went to look for a prom dress!! They walked in and there were 4 salesperson on the floor. They went up stairs and no one came up to help them at all!! So they looked around for 15 or 20 minutes. They went to leave and they were like we were just coming up to help you!! My wife is Asian and she said they looked at her in a way she did not feel comfortable. I hate that they did not have a good experience!! It was suppose be a good mother daughter outing!! I am not spending my money in a place like that!!

name: mona moore
text:
Best place to get a dress.
They help you so much
Very nice ladies

name: Steph Brooks
text: We had the best experience at The Clothes Tree.  So many selections. Jamie was extremely attentive, knowledgeable and kind. We will definitely shop there in the future.

text: The best selection for formal gowns! Staff is friendly and so helpful! They are always good to give compliments and tell you what looks best. Love doing business here.

text: The experience was fun I didn't find the dress I wanted but EVERYONE WAS SOOOOO NICE AND HELPFUL I would  definitely  go back to shop......

name: Tiffany Terry
text: This is a hidden gem. I can not express how awesome this place is. They are a consignment shop, however, if you are wanting to have them purchase your items.. You'll want to make an appointment asap, as they are usually booked solid a few weeks out. If you're just wanting to shop however, check them out! The store appears small (as it's in a shopping center), however, it's much larger and will offer you hundreds of gently used items too glance through. They are currently (to my knowledge) selling women's, men's, and a small amount of children's clothing, shoes, and accessories. This place is fun, so plan on allowing yourself extra time so you can really look around!!

name: Ashley Mae
text: Workers really take care of you and help you with whatever you need! Always neat and organized!

name: Gwendolyn Harris
text: Love, love, love this store! They have a variety of different dresses and clothing. Prom, formal, wedding, casual stylish clothing.

name: Tara Elliott
text:
Mr. Tiemann, I am not sure what you mean by a typical consignment shop?  I did not realize Birmingham was full of shops like this one.  I am taking it this is what you mean by typical?

Do not listen to Mr. Tiemann, this is a fabulous place to shop and the experience is as good as it gets!!!  The merchandise is not cheap (I do agree), but the quality of the merchandise and the extraordinary service that is offered every single time you walk in the shop is not touched in the state of Alabama!  I promise you!!!!!!

If you want to have a fun time, go shopping at The Clothes Tree!!!

name: TipTip *
text: Beautiful selection of prom dresses!!! Wonderful helpful staff. Will definitely return.
